verses.verse: These <WH428> are the words <WH1697> of the covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Moses <WH4872> to make <WH3772> with <WH854> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> he made <WH3772> with <WH854> them in Horeb. <WH2722>

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> unto <WH413> all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Ye <WH859> have seen <WH7200> <WH853> all <WH3605> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> did <WH6213> before your eyes <WH5869> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> unto Pharaoh, <WH6547> and unto all <WH3605> his servants, <WH5650> and unto all <WH3605> his land; <WH776>
The great <WH1419> temptations <WH4531> which <WH834> thine eyes <WH5869> have seen, <WH7200> the signs, <WH226> and those <WH1992> great <WH1419> miracles: <WH4159>

Yet the LORD <WH3068> hath not <WH3808> given <WH5414> you a heart <WH3820> to perceive, <WH3045> and eyes <WH5869> to see, <WH7200> and ears <WH241> to hear, <WH8085> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

And I have led <WH1980> you forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness: <WH4057> your clothes <WH8008> are not <WH3808> waxen old <WH1086> upon <WH4480> <WH5921> you, and thy shoe <WH5275> is not <WH3808> waxen old <WH1086> upon <WH4480> <WH5921> thy foot. <WH7272>

Ye have not <WH3808> eaten <WH398> bread, <WH3899> neither <WH3808> have ye drunk <WH8354> wine <WH3196> or strong drink: <WH7941> that <WH4616> ye might know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

And when ye came <WH935> unto <WH413> this <WH2088> place, <WH4725> Sihon <WH5511> the king <WH4428> of Heshbon, <WH2809> and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> came out <WH3318> against <WH7125> us unto battle, <WH4421> and we smote <WH5221> them:

And we took <WH3947> <WH853> their land, <WH776> and gave <WH5414> it for an inheritance <WH5159> unto the Reubenites, <WH7206> and to the Gadites, <WH1425> and to the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh. <WH4520>
Keep <WH8104> therefore <WH853> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> covenant, <WH1285> and do <WH6213> them, that <WH4616> ye may prosper <WH7919> <WH853> in all <WH3605> that <WH834> ye do. <WH6213>

Ye <WH859> stand <WH5324> this day <WH3117> all <WH3605> of you before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> your God; <WH430> your captains <WH7218> of your tribes, <WH7626> your elders, <WH2205> and your officers, <WH7860> with all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Israel, <WH3478>

Your little ones, <WH2945> your wives, <WH802> and thy stranger <WH1616> that <WH834> is in <WH7130> thy camp, <WH4264> from the hewer <WH4480> <WH2404> of thy wood <WH6086> unto <WH5704> the drawer <WH7579> of thy water: <WH4325>

That thou shouldest enter <WH5674> into covenant <WH1285> with the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> and into his oath, <WH423> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> maketh <WH3772> with <WH5973> thee this day: <WH3117>

That <WH4616> he may establish <WH6965> thee today <WH3117> for a people <WH5971> unto himself, and that he <WH1931> may be <WH1961> unto thee a God, <WH430> as <WH834> he hath said <WH1696> unto thee, and as <WH834> he hath sworn <WH7650> unto thy fathers, <WH1> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob. <WH3290>
Neither <WH3808> with <WH854> you only <WH905> do I <WH595> make <WH3772> <WH853> this <WH2063> covenant <WH1285> and this <WH2063> oath; <WH423>

But <WH3588> with <WH854> him that <WH834> standeth <WH5975> here <WH6311> with <WH5973> us this day <WH3117> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> and also with <WH854> him that <WH834> is not <WH369> here <WH6311> with <WH5973> us this day: <WH3117>

(For <WH3588> ye <WH859> know <WH3045> <WH853> how <WH834> we have dwelt <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt; <WH4714> and how <WH834> we came <WH5674> through <WH7130> the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> ye passed by; <WH5674>
And ye have seen <WH7200> <WH853> their abominations, <WH8251> and their idols, <WH1544> wood <WH6086> and stone, <WH68> silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> which <WH834> were among <WH5973> them: )

Lest <WH6435> there should be <WH3426> among you man, <WH376> or <WH176> woman, <WH802> or <WH176> family, <WH4940> or <WH176> tribe, <WH7626> whose <WH834> heart <WH3824> turneth away <WH6437> this day <WH3117> from <WH4480> <WH5973> the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> to go <WH1980> and serve <WH5647> <WH853> the gods <WH430> of these <WH1992> nations; <WH1471> lest <WH6435> there should be <WH3426> among you a root <WH8328> that beareth <WH6509> gall <WH7219> and wormwood; <WH3939>

And it come to pass, <WH1961> when he heareth <WH8085> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> curse, <WH423> that he bless himself <WH1288> in his heart, <WH3824> saying, <WH559> I shall have <WH1961> peace, <WH7965> though <WH3588> I walk <WH1980> in the imagination <WH8307> of mine heart, <WH3820> to <WH4616> add <WH5595> drunkenness <WH7302> to <WH854> thirst: <WH6771>

The LORD <WH3068> will <WH14> not <WH3808> spare <WH5545> him, but <WH3588> then <WH227> the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> and his jealousy <WH7068> shall smoke <WH6225> against that <WH1931> man, <WH376> and all <WH3605> the curses <WH423> that are written <WH3789> in this <WH2088> book <WH5612> shall lie <WH7257> upon him, and the LORD <WH3068> shall blot out <WH4229> <WH853> his name <WH8034> from under <WH4480> <WH8478> heaven. <WH8064>

And the LORD <WH3068> shall separate <WH914> him unto evil <WH7451> out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> the tribes <WH7626> of Israel, <WH3478> according to all <WH3605> the curses <WH423> of the covenant <WH1285> that are written <WH3789> in this <WH2088> book <WH5612> of the law: <WH8451>

So that the generation <WH1755> to come <WH314> of your children <WH1121> that <WH834> shall rise up <WH6965> after <WH4480> <WH310> you, and the stranger <WH5237> that <WH834> shall come <WH935> from a far <WH7350> land, <WH4480> <WH776> shall say, <WH559> when they see <WH7200> <WH853> the plagues <WH4347> of that <WH1931> land, <WH776> and the sicknesses <WH8463> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath laid <WH2470> upon it;

And that the whole <WH3605> land <WH776> thereof is brimstone, <WH1614> and salt, <WH4417> and burning, <WH8316> that it is not <WH3808> sown, <WH2232> nor <WH3808> beareth, <WH6779> nor <WH3808> any <WH3605> grass <WH6212> groweth <WH5927> therein, like the overthrow <WH4114> of Sodom, <WH5467> and Gomorrah, <WH6017> Admah, <WH126> and Zeboim, <WH6636> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> overthrew <WH2015> in his anger, <WH639> and in his wrath: <WH2534>

Even all <WH3605> nations <WH1471> shall say, <WH559> Wherefore <WH5921> <WH4100> hath the LORD <WH3068> done <WH6213> thus <WH3602> unto this <WH2063> land? <WH776> what <WH4100> meaneth the heat <WH2750> of this <WH2088> great <WH1419> anger? <WH639>

Then men shall say, <WH559> Because <WH5921> <WH834> they have forsaken <WH5800> <WH853> the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of their fathers, <WH1> which <WH834> he made <WH3772> with <WH5973> them when he brought them forth <WH3318> <WH853> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt: <WH4714>

For they went <WH1980> and served <WH5647> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and worshiped <WH7812> them, gods <WH430> whom <WH834> they knew <WH3045> not, <WH3808> and whom he had not <WH3808> given <WH2505> unto them:

And the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> against this <WH1931> land, <WH776> to bring <WH935> upon <WH5921> it <WH853> all <WH3605> the curses <WH7045> that are written <WH3789> in this <WH2088> book: <WH5612>

And the LORD <WH3068> rooted them out <WH5428> of <WH4480> <WH5921> their land <WH127> in anger, <WH639> and in wrath, <WH2534> and in great <WH1419> indignation, <WH7110> and cast <WH7993> them into <WH413> another <WH312> land, <WH776> as it is this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

The secret <WH5641> things belong unto the LORD <WH3068> our God: <WH430> but those things which are revealed <WH1540> belong unto us and to our children <WH1121> forever, <WH5704> <WH5769> that we may do <WH6213> <WH853> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> law. <WH8451>
